name: Godseeker Aniri

skills.name: Blade of Blessings
skills.description: Attacks 1 enemy. Heals the ally with the lowest HP by 5% of their MAX HP. Cannot heal this champion.

effects.notes: Heals lowest HP ally by 5% MAX HP. Cannot heal self.

skills.notes: Great for keeping allies alive, especially in Clan Boss.

skills.name: Quest for Meaning
skills.description: Attacks all enemies. Heals all allies by 15% of their MAX HP, then decreases the duration of all buffs on all enemies by 1 turn and increases the duration of all buffs on all allies by 1 turn.

effects.notes: Heals all allies by 15% MAX HP.
Increases duration of all buffs on all allies by 1 turn.
Decreases duration of all buffs on all enemies by 1 turn.

skills.notes: Excellent for buff control and team sustain.

skills.name: Rise of Glory
skills.description: Revives a dead ally with 50% HP, then fills their Turn Meter by 50% and resets the cooldowns of all their skills.
skills.notes: One of the best single-target revives in the game.

skills.name: Guardian Angel
skills.description: [Passive Effect] Increases the amount of healing allies receive by 10%. [Active Effect] If an ally is about to get killed by a fatal hit, preempts that hit and instantly places a [Revive On Death] buff on them for 1 turn before the damage is taken.

effects.notes: Places Revive On Death for 1 turn before fatal hit.

forms.aura: Increases Ally DEF in all Battles by 30%.
forms.comments: Godseeker Aniri is one of the best epic revivers and healers in the game, with unique cooldown reset and passive team sustain.

general: PRIORITY OFFENSE T6: WARMASTER (A1 'Blade of Blessings' and A2 'Quest for Meaning' are single-hit DEF-scaling attacks - 60% proc per skill for 4% boss MAX HP / 6% dungeon boss MAX HP damage). Giant Slayer is INCORRECT for Godseeker Aniri (no multi-hit skills - current 'dungeons' entry is a mistake).
PRIORITY DEFENSE T6: Unshakeable (CRITICAL +50 RES - base 45 RES = 95 total for reviver role, essential for Arena/Doom Tower to resist debuffs and survive to revive team).

PRIORITY SUPPORT T6: Lay on Hands + Healing Savior (CRITICAL - boost all healing from A1 5% heal, A2 15% heal, A3 30% heal + Continuous Heal placement), Lasting Gifts (CRITICAL - synergizes with A2 buff extension mechanic - extends ally buffs by 1 turn, Lasting Gifts adds another turn extension).

KEY MASTERIES: Warmaster (A1/A2 single-hit DEF-scaling), Unshakeable (95 RES total for reviver), Lay on Hands + Healing Savior (CRITICAL healing boost for entire kit), Lasting Gifts (buff extension synergy with A2), Cycle of Magic (A2/A3 cooldown spam), Timely Intervention (TM on ally low HP for support).

SYNERGIES: A1 heals lowest HP ally by 5% MAX HP (cannot heal self - benefits from Lay on Hands + Healing Savior). A2 AoE damage + heals all allies 15% MAX HP + decreases enemy buff duration by 1 turn + increases ally buff duration by 1 turn (Lasting Gifts extends ally buffs further). A3 revives all dead allies to 30% HP + places Continuous Heal for 2 turns + fills TM by 30% (benefits from Lay on Hands + Healing Savior for stronger revive heal + Continuous Heal). Passive 'Rebirth' revives one random ally when Aniri dies (50% HP revive, 1-turn CD - only works once). Build for DEF% (scales damage and tanking), HP% (survivability), 200+ SPD, 95 RES (with Unshakeable) for reviver role.

UNIQUE MECHANICS: A2 EXTENDS ally buff duration by 1 turn + DECREASES enemy buff duration by 1 turn (unique mechanic, synergizes with Lasting Gifts for extended ally buffs). Passive 'Rebirth' revives random ally on death (insurance revive if Aniri dies before using A3). A3 revives ALL dead allies (mass revive - meta for Faction Wars, Doom Tower, dungeons).

REVIVER ROLE: Base 45 RES (above average) + Unshakeable +50 = 95 RES total. Essential for surviving to revive team in Arena/Doom Tower. Lay on Hands + Healing Savior boost all heals (A1 5% → higher, A2 15% → higher, A3 30% + Continuous Heal → higher). Lasting Gifts + A2 buff extension = extended ally buffs for team survivability.

ai_quirks.ai_issue_description: AI will always use A2 if available, which is optimal for most content.

mechanics_advisory: Best used in revive/sustain teams. Passive enables unique protection and healing for all content.
